name: Love Fantasy: Match & Stories
description:
Prepare yourself for this big date with a makeover that will make your secret crush fall in love with you!
-Play and solve match-3 puzzles to begin your romantic date
-Choose from tons of makeup items and style your hair to accent all your beautiful features!
-Get ready for a stylish look!
-Your handsome love has arrived at your door!

Fall in love with your crush!Get stylish,get fit,and dance away!
